about_the_game:
"The Button Witch" Soundtrack:

The ideal companion for your rainy and lonely afternoons at home studying magic!
20 tracks of ambient - lofi - background music and some more bubbly ones for the special moments.

Full tracklist:

- Title Theme
- A Big Garden
- Walking Time
- Squirrel Funk
- Guitar & Piano 1
- Guitar & Piano 2
- This Track is On Fire
- Slow Pace
- Tea Time
- Veranda
- Art Room
- Bedroom Sonata
- Murder Mystery
- The Tower
- Emotional
- Walking on Ice
- Thimble's Theme A
- Thimbel's Theme B
- Crescendo
- Title Theme (Reprise)
